column4: yesterday i had only the i386 cd version of ubuntu... so I installed it on my computer. I have a xeon cpu. I managed to grab the 64bits version of ubuntu. should i reinstall with this one ?
the 64bit version has some issues, as far as I know you're better off with 32bit
what do u mean some issues ?
sorry for my poor memory, but the only one I recall was with partitions (or file sizes?) > 1TB. I know I've heard of others, just don't remember what they were.
